text:
Scenario:

Create a Module Controller referencing a Target controller somewhere.
Save the plan
Rename one of the elements of the path to Target Controller and save the plan
Reload the plan
The Module Controller has lost the path to Target Controller
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text: *** Bug 60675 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

creator: andrii.soskov@gmail.com
text:
Hi again, sorry for the spam, seems like Module Controller referencing a Target controller works fine, in my case the issue was in disabled Module controller which looks to the old target name. So revise your plan, remove/adjust disable items and try again

hope it helps,
Andrey
*** Bug 61370 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
